## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G19220](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G19220)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CYO1, SCO2</u>
- **Gene Name:** SHI-YO-U MEANS COTYLEDON IN JAPANESE, SNOWY COTYLEDON 2
- **Description:**   protein disulfide isomerase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2094093
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS68145]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Pale cotyledons and green true leaves in 14 day-old seedlings; however, upon precocious germination, seedlings of sco2 and wild-type are indistinguishable. Reduced survival rate upon exposure to an extended period of etiolation compared to wild-type.
   - [cyo1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Albino cotyledons, abnormal chloroplast biogenesis.  True leaves are not affected, chloroplast development during embryo biogenesis is not affected.  Affected in photomorphogenesis after prolonged skotomorphogenesis (after 4 days in dark unable to undergo photomorphogenesis).
   - [sco2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Albino cotyledons, abnormal chloroplast biogenesis.  True leaves are not affected, chloroplast development during embryo biogenesis is not affected.  Affected in photomorphogenesis after prolonged skotomorphogenesis (after 4 days in dark unable to undergo photomorphogenesis).
   - [sco2-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Albino cotyledons, abnormal chloroplast biogenesis.  True leaves are not affected, chloroplast development during embryo biogenesis is not affected.  Affected in photomorphogenesis after prolonged skotomorphogenesis (after 4 days in dark unable to undergo photomorphogenesis).
## Literature:
   - [Snowy cotyledon 2: the identification of a zinc finger domain protein essential  for chloroplast development in cotyledons but not in true leaves.](https://www.doi.org/10.1007/s11103-008-9291-y)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1007/s11103-008-9291-y](https://www.doi.org/10.1007/s11103-008-9291-y);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[18209955](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18209955/)

   - [Oxidative folding in chloroplasts.](https://www.doi.org/10.1089/ars.2012.4582)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1089/ars.2012.4582](https://www.doi.org/10.1089/ars.2012.4582);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[23289792](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23289792/)
   - [Identification and Roles of Photosystem II Assembly, Stability, and Repair  Factors in Arabidopsis.](https://www.doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2016.00168)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.3389/fpls.2016.00168](https://www.doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2016.00168);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[26909098](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26909098/)
